metadata.title: CVE-2022-40303 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in libxml2 before 2.10.3. When parsing amulti-gigabyte XML document with the XML_PARSE_HUGE parser option enabled,several integer counters can overflow. This results in an attempt to accessan array at a negative 2GB offset, typically leading to a segmentationfault.

criterions.comment: libxml2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
